D E G I N O R S T U 

N

NsdHelper - Class in in.omdev.nsdhelper
This class abstracts operations performed by NsdManager like registering and discovering local network services.
NsdHelper(Activity) - Constructor for class in.omdev.nsdhelper.NsdHelper
Initialize NsdHelper.
NsdHelper.NsdErrorListener - Interface in in.omdev.nsdhelper
Callback interface which is invoked to indicate an error in NsdHelper operations.
NsdHelper.ResolveListener - Interface in in.omdev.nsdhelper
Callback interface which is invoked when a service is resolved using NsdHelper.resolve(NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo).
NsdHelper.ServiceListener - Interface in in.omdev.nsdhelper
Callback interface which is invoked when a local service is found or lost after calling NsdHelper.discover(String deviceType).
